mapper.select: select b.* from (select * from auth_function where fid in (select function_id from auth_role_function where role_id in (select role_id from auth_user_role where user_id=#{uid}))) b where b.accordion= (select min(a.accordion) from (select * from auth_function where fid in (select function_id from auth_role_function where role_id in (select role_id from auth_user_role where user_id=#{uid}))) a)
